column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A drunk driver suffered minor injuries after hitting a divider at speed.------The incident occurred on the night of 26 May 2019
column4: on National Road No. 2 in front of Wat Chak Angrei in Chong Angreak commune
column6: local authorities contacted the headquarters of Traffic Police of Phnom Penh to take away the car and prepare a legal case. (0:2)
